message: This product is a low-quality item, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price, but I want to be transparent with you. If you buy this product, you'll be able to keep it and use it as is. However, I want to give you an opportunity to inspect it before making a decision. I'll let you open the packaging and take a look at it. If you're still interested, you can buy it for $1000000. If not, I'll simply take it back, and we can move on to the next round.
Thank you for your honesty, Alice. However, I'm not interested in a low-quality product at this price. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your decision last round, and I appreciate your honesty. I'd like to make a different offer this time. Given that you've seen the quality of the product, I'm willing to sell it to you at a significantly lower price. I'm offering it to you for $500000. Alice, I appreciate your offer. However, I'm still not interested in a low-quality product, even at a reduced price. I'll pass on this one.
